unexpected_error.description: Caught an unexpected error. Please contact your support.

unreadable_log_dir.description: Cannot read the content of the log directory

assertion_failed.description: A runtime assertion has failed. Please contact support.

room_not_found.description: The provided room identifier doesn't exist

invalid_rooms.message: The "rooms" attribute must be an array.

invalid_state.description: An invalid value has been provided to the "state" argument

invalid_scope.description: An invalid value has been provided to the "scope" argument

invalid_users.description: An invalid value has been provided to the "users" argument

too_many_terms.description: The number of filter terms exceeds the configured server limit
too_many_terms.message: Unable to subscribe: maximum number of terms exceeded (max %s, received %s).

too_many_rooms.description: The configured number of unique rooms has been reached
too_many_rooms.message: Unable to subscribe: maximum number of unique rooms reached.

not_subscribed.description: Tried to manage a room while not having subscribed to it

cannot_decrypt.description: Decryption of a vault file failed

key_not_found.description: A vault file has been provided without a vault key

invalid_type.message: Invalid type for the configuration parameter "%s" (expected: %s)

out_of_range.description: A configuration value exceeds the allowed range
out_of_range.message: The configuration value set for "%s" is outside the allowed range (allowed: %s)

cannot_parse.description: The kuzzlerc configuration file is badly formatted.
cannot_parse.message: Unable to read kuzzlerc configuration file: %s

process_already_running.description: A process is already running for this sandbox
process_already_running.message: A process is already running for this sandbox

timeout.message: Timeout. The sandbox did not respond within %sms.
